ProjectTitle:
Managing Language Barriers in Unplanned Care 
Acronym: MaLBUC
InitialFeedbackHistory:
05/04/2023
Please note that you used an older DMP template, BOF now use the Flemish standard DMP template that you can find in DMPonline.be by selecting that there is no funder associated with your project when creating the DMP. Please use this template for your future DMPs. 
Ethics: please add the number(s) of your ethical approval and privacy registry 
Storage: storing data on external hard drives is not very secure, is this approved in your ethics/privacy protocol? Consult the storage guide for alternatives: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: where will you make the data underlying your publications available, you can consider using RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
